MODEL_TEXT:
<rule displayName="测试决策矩阵" x:schema="/nop/schema/rule.xdef" xmlns:x="/nop/schema/xdsl.xdef">
    <decisionMatrix>
        <cells>
            <cell pos="A1">
                <outputs>
                    <output name="result">
                        <valueExpr>1</valueExpr>
                    </output>
                </outputs>
            </cell>
            <cell pos="B1">
                <outputs>
                    <output name="result">
                        <valueExpr>2</valueExpr>
                    </output>
                </outputs>
            </cell>
            <cell pos="C1">
                <outputs>
                    <output name="result">
                        <valueExpr>3</valueExpr>
                    </output>
                </outputs>
            </cell>
            <cell pos="D1">
                <outputs>
                    <output name="result">
                        <valueExpr>4</valueExpr>
                    </output>
                </outputs>
            </cell>
            <cell pos="A2">
                <outputs>
                    <output name="result">
                        <valueExpr>5</valueExpr>
                    </output>
                </outputs>
            </cell>
            <cell pos="B2">
                <outputs>
                    <output name="result">
                        <valueExpr>6</valueExpr>
                    </output>
                </outputs>
            </cell>
            <cell pos="C2">
                <outputs>
                    <output name="result">
                        <valueExpr>7</valueExpr>
                    </output>
                </outputs>
            </cell>
            <cell pos="D2">
                <outputs>
                    <output name="result">
                        <valueExpr>8</valueExpr>
                    </output>
                </outputs>
            </cell>
            <cell pos="A3">
                <outputs>
                    <output name="result">
                        <valueExpr>9</valueExpr>
                    </output>
                </outputs>
            </cell>
            <cell pos="B3">
                <outputs>
                    <output name="result">
                        <valueExpr>10</valueExpr>
                    </output>
                </outputs>
            </cell>
            <cell pos="C3">
                <outputs>
                    <output name="result">
                        <valueExpr>11</valueExpr>
                    </output>
                </outputs>
            </cell>
            <cell pos="D3">
                <outputs>
                    <output name="result">
                        <valueExpr>12</valueExpr>
                    </output>
                </outputs>
            </cell>
            <cell pos="A4">
                <outputs>
                    <output name="result">
                        <valueExpr>13</valueExpr>
                    </output>
                </outputs>
            </cell>
            <cell pos="B4">
                <outputs>
                    <output name="result">
                        <valueExpr>14</valueExpr>
                    </output>
                    <output name="type">
                        <valueExpr> 'A'</valueExpr>
                    </output>
                </outputs>
            </cell>
            <cell pos="C4">
                <outputs>
                    <output name="result">
                        <valueExpr>15</valueExpr>
                    </output>
                </outputs>
            </cell>
            <cell pos="D4">
                <outputs>
                    <output name="result">
                        <valueExpr>16</valueExpr>
                    </output>
                </outputs>
            </cell>
        </cells>
        <colDecider>
            <children>
                <child id="C1" label="有房">
                    <children>
                        <child id="C2" label="已婚">
                            <predicate>
                                <eq name="是否已婚" value="已婚"/>
                            </predicate>
                        </child>
                        <child id="D2" label="未婚" leafIndex="1">
                            <predicate>
                                <eq name="是否已婚" value="未婚"/>
                            </predicate>
                        </child>
                    </children>
                    <predicate>
                        <eq name="是否有房" value="@:true"/>
                    </predicate>
                </child>
                <child id="F1" label="无房">
                    <children>
                        <child id="F2" label="已婚" leafIndex="2">
                            <predicate>
                                <eq name="是否已婚" value="已婚"/>
                            </predicate>
                        </child>
                        <child id="G2" label="未婚" leafIndex="3">
                            <predicate>
                                <eq name="是否已婚" value="未婚"/>
                            </predicate>
                        </child>
                    </children>
                    <predicate>
                        <eq name="是否有房" value="@:false"/>
                    </predicate>
                </child>
            </children>
        </colDecider>
        <rowDecider>
            <children>
                <child id="A3" label="<20">
                    <children>
                        <child id="B3" label="男">
                            <predicate>
                                <eq name="gender" value="@:1"/>
                            </predicate>
                        </child>
                        <child id="B4" label="女" leafIndex="1">
                            <predicate>
                                <eq name="gender" value="@:2"/>
                            </predicate>
                        </child>
                    </children>
                    <predicate>
                        <lt name="baseInfo.age" value="@:20"/>
                    </predicate>
                </child>
                <child id="A5" label="<30">
                    <children>
                        <child id="B5" label="男" leafIndex="2">
                            <predicate>
                                <eq name="gender" value="@:1"/>
                            </predicate>
                        </child>
                    </children>
                    <predicate>
                        <lt name="baseInfo.age" value="@:30"/>
                    </predicate>
                </child>
                <child id="A6" label=">=30">
                    <children>
                        <child id="B6" label="-" leafIndex="3">
                            <predicate>
                                <alwaysTrue/>
                            </predicate>
                        </child>
                    </children>
                    <predicate>
                        <ge name="baseInfo.age" value="@:30"/>
                    </predicate>
                </child>
            </children>
        </rowDecider>
    </decisionMatrix>
    <inputs>
        <input displayName="是否有房" mandatory="true" name="是否有房" type="Boolean" ext:level="0">
            <schema/>
        </input>
        <input displayName="是否已婚" mandatory="true" name="是否已婚" type="String" ext:level="0">
            <schema/>
        </input>
        <input displayName="基础信息" mandatory="true" name="baseInfo" type="Object" ext:level="0">
            <schema implementsTypes="">
                <props>
                    <prop displayName="年龄" mandatory="true" name="age" type="Integer" ext:level="1"
                          i18n-en:displayName="Age">
                        <schema type="Integer"/>
                    </prop>
                    <prop displayName="性别" mandatory="true" name="gender" type="Integer" ext:level="1">
                        <schema type="Integer"/>
                    </prop>
                </props>
            </schema>
        </input>
        <input computed="true" displayName="性别" mandatory="true" name="gender" type="Integer" ext:level="0">
            <defaultExpr>baseInfo.gender</defaultExpr>
            <schema dict="auth/gender"/>
        </input>
    </inputs>
    <outputs>
        <output displayName="分数" name="result" type="Double" ext:level="0">
            <schema/>
        </output>
        <output displayName="类型" name="type" type="String" ext:level="0">
            <schema/>
        </output>
    </outputs>
</rule>
